article:
'Share' is a Caribbean and Black Canadian community newspaper based in Toronto,
Ontario, Canada. Canada's largest ethnic newspaper, Share has two times the
circulation of any other Canadian newspaper serving the same ethnic community.
It is distributed free of charge in many locations, particularly in the Greater
Toronto Area.

The weekly publication, on quarter-folded, tabloid-sized newsprint, includes
news from the Caribbean and Africa, sports, entertainment, business, religion,
analysis, and commentaries from its community's point of view.

Arnold Auguste is the newspaper's publisher. Founded in April 1978, Share is
owned by Arnold A. Auguste Associates Limited.
categories: Multicultural and ethnic newspapers published in Canada
